description: The High Priestess of the Tempus Spatium, and presides over the gender selection ceremony at the Spring. Daikuurikans are born female, and choose a sex at age 17; in Simulacrum, this is done by going to the Spring at the temple of Tempus Spatium. As head of Simulacrum`s High Council, she serves as head of state. She is the last survivor of Chor Dextra, and has lived for many generations; she once had another name, and part of the mystery of the series is to discover who she is.
name: Onasia
